title: Price drop: This app boils down bestsellers so you can read them in 15 minutes
description: Whiz through bestsellers in 15 minutes flat with a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium book summaries for just $59.99 (normally $300). (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Whiz through bestsellers in 15 minutes flat with a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium book summaries for just $59.99 (normally $300).

Let’s flip the script and embark on an adventure of self-discovery. Instead of squandering your free moments on X or Bluesky, you can transform them into opportunities for growth. How, you ask? Well, get ready for a deal that will unleash your inner genius — with Headway’s inspiring book summaries. Think of Headway Premium as your new gateway to enlightenment. It puts a treasure trove of popular reads right at your fingertips, neatly tucked into an app that’s bursting with knowledge. Right now, a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium is going for the unbelievable price of just $59.99, a savings of 80%. This popular app offers book summaries in all genres What’s inside this wonderland of wisdom? Headway Premium can serve as your private passport to 1,500 summaries of jaw-dropping nonfiction books. You want variety? Oh, you’ve got it! Dive into genres you adore or venture into uncharted territory — the choice is yours. The magic doesn’t stop there, either. Ever wished you could conquer bestselling novels in a fraction of the time it takes to brew your morning coffee? Well, Headway Premium crafts these literary giants into bite-size, 15-minute summaries that pack more punch than a triple espresso. html:
• Daily deals
  • Top Stories

Tired of the endless loop of doom scrolling? Let’s flip the script and embark on an adventure of self-discovery. Instead of squandering your free moments on X or Bluesky, you can transform them into opportunities for growth. How, you ask? Well, get ready for a deal that will unleash your inner genius — with Headway’s inspiring book summaries.

Think of Headway Premium as your new gateway to enlightenment. It puts a treasure trove of popular reads right at your fingertips, neatly tucked into an app that’s bursting with knowledge. Right now, a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium is going for the unbelievable price of just $59.99, a savings of 80%.

This popular app offers book summaries in all genres

What’s inside this wonderland of wisdom? Headway Premium can serve as your private passport to 1,500 summaries of jaw-dropping nonfiction books. You want variety? Oh, you’ve got it! Dive into genres you adore or venture into uncharted territory — the choice is yours.

The magic doesn’t stop there, either. Ever wished you could conquer bestselling novels in a fraction of the time it takes to brew your morning coffee? Well, Headway Premium crafts these literary giants into bite-size, 15-minute summaries that pack more punch than a triple espresso.

Audio book summaries, too

You also can opt to hear talented voice actors weave these book summaries into an auditory masterpiece. It’s like having your very own bookish fairy godmother guiding you through the tales.

Now, we all know there’s nothing quite like diving into the heart of a full book. But Headway’s approach works like a charm. It’s like a sneak peek into a world of knowledge — a test run to see if the universe of each book aligns with your cosmic interests.

Don’t just take our word for it. Headway Premium earned a dazzling 4.6 out of 5 stars after 100-plus reviews on Cult of Mac Deals! Just ask May, a savvy reader who wrote: “Headway turned my reading game on its head! With this app, I’m zooming through summaries and grasping the essence of books in a flash.”

It works on iPhones, iPads, Macs (with M1 chip or later) and Android devices. (See specs for compatibility details.)

Save on a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium

The journey of curiosity never needs to end. We’re offering you a front-row seat to endless enlightenment with a lifetime access pass to Headway Premium for just $59.99 (normally $299.95).

Don’t just scroll through life — seize the moment and let Headway Premium’s book summaries pave the way for your odyssey of self-growth. Dive in, embrace the adventure, and start your voyage with a single tap.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

New users only. Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this post on Headway book summaries on August 17, 2023. We updated the info.
